long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To enhance privacy in shared spaces, a WhatsApp™ Web privacy extension blurs your messages until you hover over them.

Your messages and other content will only appear when you hover your cursor over them.

How to hide messages? You can toggle different settings on the WhatsApp privacy extension to meet your personal needs.

Features:
Screen Lock: Using Password Protection
Blur messages within chats.
Blur message previews on the left side of the screen.
Blur all media (images, videos, stickers, etc.) separate from the text.
Blur profile pictures.
Hover to display specific content as needed.

More Tools Recommendation:
Our team has delved deeply into the realm of WhatsApp for quite some time, offering various extensions in different functional directions on our More Tools page for you to choose from.  
------------------------------------------
LEGAL
------------------------------------------
WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc. registered in the U.S. and other countries. WAPlus is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp.
long.zh_CN:
为了增强隐私，WhatsApp™Web隐私扩展模糊了您的消息，您可以通过鼠标悬停的方式来显示您的消息

您的消息和其他内容只有当您将光标悬停在它们上面时才会出现。

如何模糊聊天信息?你可以在WhatsApp隐私扩展上切换不同的设置来满足你的个人需求。

核心功能列表:
屏幕锁定:设置密码来解锁您的whatsApp web 屏幕
消息模糊：在聊天中模糊您的消息
消息预览：模糊屏幕左侧的消息预览
消息分类：将所有媒体(图像、视频、贴纸等)与文本分开设置，满足您的不同需求
头像模糊：模糊展示联系人头像
内容显示：根据您的配置悬停鼠标来显示您的特定消息
   
更多工具推荐：
我们的团队在 WhatsApp 扩展领域深耕多时，为您提供了更多功能扩展，让您有更多选择。  

------------------------------------------
声明
------------------------------------------

WhatsApp是WhatsApp Inc.在美国和其他国家注册的商标。WAPlus是一个独立的项目，与WhatsApp没有任何关系。
